<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_apptmnt_booking_day_configuration</collection> <condition>previous.active == true</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_apptmnt_booking_day_configuration">service_configuration.default_timezone=location^service_configuration.appointment_booking_config.task_table=wu_appointment^EQ<item display_value="Appointment Location" endquery="false" field="service_configuration.default_timezone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="location"/> <item endquery="false" field="service_configuration.appointment_booking_config.task_table" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="wu_appointment"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Delete of day level config</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var util = new sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingUtil(); var hasActiveAppointments = util.hasActiveAppointmentsInRangeForCatalog(previous, previous.start_date, previous.end_date, previous.daily_start_time, previous.daily_end_time); if(hasActiveAppointments){ current.setAbortAction(true); gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Active appointments found. Before deleting the configuration, clear active appointments affected by the change")); gs.setRedirect(current); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-22 11:34:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>34ac2e2121432010f877aa04a7c93f4d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Delete of day level config</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Appointment Booking" source="sn_apptmnt_booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Appointment Booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_34ac2e2121432010f877aa04a7c93f4d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-04-09 11:00:53</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=34ac2e2121432010f877aa04a7c93f4d"/> </record_update>
